meanings.definition: A form of vitamin D found in animal products and produced by the skin when exposed to sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended taking cholecalciferol supplements for better bone health.
meanings.sent2: Milk is a good source of cholecalciferol, which helps in calcium absorption.
meanings.sent3: The cholecalciferol in the cheese was so happy to be part of a delicious sandwich.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like cholecalciferol, bringing warmth and brightness to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight transformed into cholecalciferol, nourishing the plants with its vitamin D goodness.
